src_original: na vedhati na pratibhāsati na vighātamāpadyate,
ratnakūṭena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu ratnakūṭa iva saṃdṛśyate /
akṣarāpagatena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣvekākṣaramapi nopalabhate /  ālaṃbanacchedena samādhinā sarvālaṃbanāṃ vyupacchinatti /
aniketacareṇa samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu niketaṃ nopalabhate /  timirāpagatena samādhinā sarvasamādhicaraṇaṃ na samanupaśyati,  tamoviṣayaṃ samatikrāmati /
